java.log(userInfo)
UNE=userInfo['æ‰‹æœºå·ç /é‚®ç®±å·']

	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
}
</js>

<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// è·å–åŒ…å«<li>å…ƒç´ çš„<div>å…ƒç´ 
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// å°†divsè½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ•°ç»„ä»¥ä¾¿æ’åº
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// æŒ‰ç…§data-idå±æ€§å¯¹divArrayè¿›è¡Œæ’åº
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// éå†æ’åºåçš„divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // è·å–å½“å‰divä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰<li>å…ƒç´ 
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // ä½¿ç”¨data-idå±æ€§
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// è·å–åŒ…å«<li>å…ƒç´ çš„<div>å…ƒç´ 
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// å°†divsè½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ•°ç»„ä»¥ä¾¿æ’åº
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// æŒ‰ç…§data-idå±æ€§å¯¹divArrayè¿›è¡Œæ’åº
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// éå†æ’åºåçš„divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // è·å–å½“å‰divä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰<li>å…ƒç´ 
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // ä½¿ç”¨data-idå±æ€§
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

function getText(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().text() : "";
}

function getHref(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("href") : "";
}

function getSrc(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("src") : "";
}

function generateJsonList() {
    var jsonList = [];
    var uls = document.select(".mySearch ul").not(".pagination"); 

    uls.forEach(function(ul) {
        var prevDiv = ul.previousElementSibling(); 
        var imgSrc = prevDiv ? getSrc("img", prevDiv) : ""; 

        var item = {
            "img": imgSrc,
            "name": getText("li:eq(0) a.b", ul),
            "author": getText("li:eq(2)", ul),
            "wordcount": getText("li:eq(3)", ul),
            "lastchaptr": getText("li:eq(1) a", ul),
            "kind": getText("li:eq(4)", ul)+","+getText("li:eq(5)", ul),
            "url": getHref("li:eq(0) a.b", ul)
        };
        jsonList.push(item);
    });

    return jsonList;
}

result = generateJsonList();
String(java.log(JSON.stringify(result)));


</js>
$[*]

searchUrl:
<js>
providers = {
    kakuyomu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?kakuyomu\.jp\/works\/(\d+)/,
    syosetu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(ncode|novel18)\.syosetu\.com\/(\w+)/,
    novelup: /(?:https?:\/\/)?novelup\.plus\/story\/(\d+)/,
    hameln: /(?:https?:\/\/)?syosetu\.org\/novel\/(\d+)/,
    pixiv: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/series\/(\d+)|www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/show\.php\?id=(\d+))/,
    alphapolis: /(?:https?:\/\/)?www\.alphapolis\.co\.jp\/novel\/(\d+)\/(\d+)/,
    sakura: /(?:https?:\/\/)?books\d?\.fishhawk\.top\/(?:api\/)?novel\/(\w+)\/([\w-]+)/
};
for (provider in providers) {
    match = key.match(providers[provider]);
    if (match) {
        providerId = provider === 'sakura' ? match[1] : provider;
        novelId = provider === 'alphapolis' ? `${match[1]}-${match[2]}` : provider === 'pixiv' ? (match[3] ? `s${match[3]}` : match[2]) : (match[2] || match[1]);
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel/${providerId}/${novelId}`;
        break;
    } else {
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel?page=${page-1}&pageSize=20&query=${key}&provider=kakuyomu,syosetu,novelup,hameln,pixiv,alphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=1`;
    }
    url
}
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
function login() {
    username = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("è´¦å·");
    password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("å¯†ç ");
    url = `${baseUrl}/api/auth/sign-in`;
    body = JSON.stringify({
        emailOrUsername: username,
        password: password
    });
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    };
    response = java.post(url, body, headers);
    responseBody = response.body();
    authorizationObject = {
        Authorization: `Bearer ${responseBody}`
    };
    header = JSON.stringify(authorizationObject);
    source.putLoginHeader(header);
}
login();
</js>

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

        const pageMatch = url.match(/(\d+)(?:_(\d+))?\.html$/);
        if (!pageMatch) return '';
        
        const [_, baseId, currentPage] = pageMatch;
        const pageNum = currentPage ? parseInt(currentPage) : 1;
        
        // å®‰å…¨é™åˆ¶ï¼ˆæœ€å¤§3é¡µï¼‰
        if (pageNum > 2) return ''; // ç¬¬3é¡µååœæ­¢
        
        // ç”Ÿæˆæ–°URLï¼ˆå¦‚ /123_2.html â†’ /123_3.htmlï¼‰
        return url.replace(/(\d+)(?:_(\d+))?\.html$/, `${baseId}_${pageNum + 1}.html`);
    } catch(e) {
        return '';
    }
})()
</js>

<js>
if (baseUrl.startsWith('data')) {
    let decodedData = String(java.hexDecodeToString(src));
    let [ruleStr, initialUrl] = decodedData.split('|');
    let finalUrl = initialUrl;
    let initialCount = 0;
    const finalCount = 10;
    while (initialCount < finalCount) {
            initialCount++;
            let Content = java.ajax(source.key + finalUrl);
            let thUrl = java.getString(ruleStr, Content);
            finalUrl = thUrl;
         if (!thUrl.includes('_')) break;
    }
    result = java.ajax(source.key + finalUrl);
    java.setContent(result);
}
result;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let pages = Array.from(java.getStringList('option@value', null, true));

var chapters = java.ajaxAll(pages).flatMap(m => {
    let chapterLists = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(m.body()).select('.section-list');
    return Array.from(chapterLists.get(1).select('a'));
});

var list = chapters.map((item, i) => {
    let url = String(item.attr('href'));
    if (!url) {
        let thUrl = i < chapters.length - 1 ? chapters[i+1].attr('href') : chapters[i-1].attr('href');
        let ruleStr = i < chapters.length - 1 ? "#prev_url@href" : "#next_url@href";
       if (String(thUrl)) url = "data:;base64," + java.base64Encode(ruleStr + "|" + thUrl) + ',{"type": "chapter"}';
    }
    //java.log(url)
    return { 
        name: item.text(), 
        Url: url
    };
});
list;
</js>

function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//æ¡ä»¶åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå­˜åœ¨ä¸ä¸ºç©ºå’Œ0ï¼Œä¸”å°äºé•¿åº¦
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//è¿”å›åˆ—è¡¨
return m
}

<js>
var dataArray= baseUrl.replace(".html","").split('/')
var aid = dataArray.find(n=>n.includes("bxwx_")).replace("bxwx_","")

var dataArray = []
if(baseUrl.includes(".html")){
org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result ).select(".ph_list")[1].select(".br-b-1").select("a").forEach((item)=>{
dataArray.push({
   title:org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').html(),
  href:org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').attr('href'),
})
})
}else{
 org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result ).select(".duaejh").select(".br-b-1").select("a").forEach((item)=>{
 let id=String(org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').attr('onclick')).replace(/read_tz|\(|\)|;/g,"")
dataArray.push({
   title:org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').html(),
   href: `/chapter/${aid }/${id}.html`
  })
})
}
result = dataArray
</js>

function d(a, b) {
            b = CryptoJS.MD5(b).toString();
            var d = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(0, 16));
            var e = CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.parse(b.substring(16));
            return CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(a, e, { iv: d, padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7 }).toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8)
        }
match=src.match(/\.html\((d.*?"\))/);
//java.log(match[1])
if(match){
result=eval(match[1])}else result
</js>
